title: Courgette frittata
ingredients: ['225ml (8 fl oz) water', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 green pepper, seeded and chopped', '3 courgette, cut into thin slices', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '1 small red onion, diced', '6 mushrooms, chopped', '15g (1/2 oz) butter', '5 eggs', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '100g (4 oz) mozzarella cheese, grated', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
